note: The JLB was founded by IHP and Institute of Biotechnology of Technische Universität Berlin. It is headed by Profs. Mario Birkholz and Peter Neubauer. Currently, topics such as biosensors with microring resonators, electrically induced lysis, cell separation, clean room fabrication of lab-on-chip systems and design of privacy-securing implants are investigated. In teaching, "Introduction to Bioelectronics", "Practical Bioelectronics" and the lecture series "Internet & Privacy" are offered. tfr
